gw.plugin.account

Interface IAccountEvaluationCalculator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IAccountEvaluationCalculator
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Author:
    ccampo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountEvaluation calculateEvaluation(Account account, java.util.Date currentTime, int numDelinquencies, int numDelinquenciesPastGracePeriod, int numPejorativePaymentReversals, int numPolicyCancellations)

    • Method Detail

      • calculateEvaluation

        AccountEvaluation calculateEvaluation(Account account,
                                    java.util.Date currentTime,
                                    int numDelinquencies,
                                    int numDelinquenciesPastGracePeriod,
                                    int numPejorativePaymentReversals,
                                    int numPolicyCancellations)
        Compute an evaluation rating for an account based on information about how many delinquencies, insuffiencient funds occurrences, and policy cancellations have occurred on the account over a specified time period.
        Parameters:
        account - the account that is being evaluated
        currentTime - the current system time
        numDelinquencies - # delinquencies on account in last getMetricsQueryTimePeriod() days
        numDelinquenciesPastGracePeriod - # delinquencies in last getMetricsQueryTimePeriod() days that have progressed to a point past the delinquency grace period
        numPejorativePaymentReversals - # pejorative payment reversals in last getMetricsQueryTimePeriod() days
        numPolicyCancellations - # policy cancellations in last getMetricsQueryTimePeriod() days
        Returns:
        the computed evaluation of an account (eg: poor, fair, good, excellent)

      • countUniqueDelinquenciesAndCancellationsOnly

        boolean countUniqueDelinquenciesAndCancellationsOnly()
        The value returned from this method will affect how the following account evaluation metrics are computed: 1. number of delinquencies 2. number of policy cancellations
        Returns:
        true if only "unique" instances of delinquency should be counted when computing number of delinquencies and number of policy cancellations metrics for account evaluation. (e.g.: one missed payment on account with 4 policies causing policies to go delinquent/be cancelled would count as ONE delinquency/cancellation) Return false if the raw counts of delinquencies and policy cancellations should be used.

      • getMetricsQueryTimePeriod

        int getMetricsQueryTimePeriod()
        As part of account evaluation, the system will query for various metrics on the account that have occurred in the last N days. (For example: how many delinquencies have occurred on the account in the last N days, how many policy cancellations have occured on the account in the last N days, etc). This method returns that number N that will be used for the query.
        Returns:
        the number of past days over which the system will query for account evaluation metrics on this account So for example if this is 365, the system will query for evaluation metrics (such as number of delinquencies, number of policy cancellations, etc) on the account that have occurred in the last 365 days.
